question:
Jane has a 40-ounce mixture of apple juice and seltzer that is 30% apple juice. If she pours 10 more ounces of apple juice into the mixture, what percent of the mixture will be seltzer?
(A) 33%
(B) 44%
(C) 50%
(D) 56%
(E) 67%
